GSD.description:
staging: vchiq_arm: Avoid NULL ptr deref in vchiq_dump_platform_instances

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.3 by commit 51e5e5c34c22c0bfec0808d8c33e0b2fcf4c7c89. For more details please see the references link.
